name: AEAssessmentConfiguration.AutocorrectMode
desc: The set of autocorrect features that you can enable during an assessment.

items.name: static var punctuation: AEAssessmentConfiguration.AutocorrectMode
items.desc: A mode in which autocorrect checks punctuation as the user types.

items.name: static var spelling: AEAssessmentConfiguration.AutocorrectMode
items.desc: A mode in which autocorrect checks for spelling as the user types.
